name: Prowling Fear
description:
A monster prowls in the darkness...

Prowling Fear is a 2D top-down horror adventure game, where you play as a passenger aboard an interplanetary spaceship. As you wake up from cryosleep, the ship is dark and everyone else is either asleep or dead.

In order to defeat the monster that has gotten aboard, you will need to investigate the darkened ship and restore power, while fending off the creature with only your flashlight.

Will you stay courageous or will you cower in fear?

--

WASD - Move

E - Interact

F - Toggle flashlight

Credits

Benebeb

Coma Harmonium

Jaco van Hemert

Lehan Botha

Siberian Hacker
